#USED POSTGRESQL
#TABLES:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Accounts"
(
    "AccountId" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "Email" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Password" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Accounts" PRIMARY KEY ("AccountId")
)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."ActivityLogs"
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "UserId" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Timestamp" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "ActionType" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_ActivityLogs" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Interests"
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "InterestName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Interests" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Students"
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "FullName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "RollNumber" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Email" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Gender" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "DateOfBirth" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "City" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "InterestName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Department" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "DegreeTitle" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Subject" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "StartDate" date NOT NULL,
    "EndDate" date NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Students" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)

ADMIN CREDENTIALS:
email: admin@admin.com
password: admin


INSERT QUERIES:
INSERT INTO public."Interests" ("InterestName")
VALUES
    ('Cooking'),
    ('Reading'),
    ('Photography);

INSERT INTO public."Students" (
    "FullName",
    "RollNumber",
    "Email",
    "Gender",
    "DateOfBirth",
    "City",
    "InterestName",
    "Department",
    "DegreeTitle",
    "Subject",
    "StartDate",
    "EndDate"
)
VALUES
    ('John Doe', '123', 'john@example.com', 'Male', '1990-01-01', 'City1', 'Cooking', Dept1', 'Degree1', 'Subject1', '2022-01-01', '2022-12-31'),
    ('Jane Doe', '456', 'jane@example.com', 'Female', '1995-01-01', 'City2', 'Cooking','Dept2', 'Degree2', 'Subject2', '2022-01-01', '2022-12-31'),
    ('Bob Smith', '789', 'bob@example.com', 'Male', '1985-01-01', 'City3', 'Photography', 'Dept3', 'Degree3', 'Subject3', '2022-01-01', '2022-12-31');
